long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚑ NumberToWords is an extension which helps you carry out day to day number conversion to words in very easy to go way.

⚑ NumberToWords simply allows user to select any number on any webpage and converted words are shown in popover just above the selection.

Here are some examples that shows how one can use the extension: 
e.g.
1 = One
2 = Two
95450 = Ninety Five Thousand Four Hundred Fifty
100000 = One Lakh
10000000 = One crore.

The website can be used on the financial websites like Zerodha Kite, Yahoo Finance, google Finance and many more.

This extension can be used by the financial institutes like Mutual Funds, LIC, banking sector etc.

It can be used by retail investors also.

The extension is made by India by Luwak technologies.
Enjoy the creation.
